mapper.sql: a.remark as remark, a.priority as priority, a.update_date as updateDate, a.query_user_ids as queryUserIds, a.limit_time as limitTime, a.update_user as updateUser, a.son as son, a.monitor_user_id as monitorUserId, a.name as name, a.id as id, a.create_user as createUser, a.create_date as createDate, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag, a.type, a.`desc`
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.`desc` from sys_order_base_info a where delete_flag = 0
